name: Bengali-English Translator : BN-EN
description: BN-EN Translator is absolutely necessary translator, we provide voice and text translation to enable you to communicate without any barriers in all parts of the world. Translator can translate your word and text from Bengali to English and English to Bengali. Learn English ,speaking in English and also Learn Bangla quickly by using this app. (  -   )  (  -   )  Our Features:  Automatic translation  Support Two-Way Translation  Translate between Bangla and English  High level voice recognition.  Translation of words,Sentences & Phrases.  Attractive User Interface.  Social Media Sharing  Voice to Text - Text to Voice  Write Bangla word easily by your voice and share with others.  Translate [Bangla to english] Translate [English to Bangla]  Translate [Bn-En] Translate [En-BN] Translate [Translator]  If you are a student, tourist or traveler or anyone who are interested to learn english this app will help you to learn quickly.
